com.loopj.android.http

Class MySSLSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
      • com.loopj.android.http.MySSLSocketFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.http.conn.scheme.LayeredSocketFactory, org.apache.http.conn.scheme.SocketFactory

    public class MySSLSocketFactory
extends org.apache.http.conn.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
    This file is introduced to fix HTTPS Post bug on API < ICS see http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=13117#c14

     

    Warning! This omits SSL certificate validation on every device, use with caution
